bug.author: jlewi
bug.summary: jupyter web app auto-update PRs - tests keep failing

comments.comment: Issue-Label Bot is automatically applying the label kind/bug to this issue, with a confidence of 0.90. Please mark this comment with ğŸ‘ or ğŸ‘ to give our bot feedback! Links: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/marketplace/issue-label-bot>app homepage</denchmark-link> , <denchmark-link:https://mlbot.net/data/kubeflow/kubeflow>dashboard</denchmark-link> and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/hamelsmu/MLapp>code</denchmark-link> for this bot.

I think the problem is the cron job to update the image runs at a very frequent interval which is shorter than the time it takes to run the tests. The update script keeps doing a force push which ends up retriggering the tests.

Looks like the test might be passing now e.g. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/pull/3355>#3355</denchmark-link>
Lets see if that's merged successfully.
